name: transfer_tokens
body: require ! (ctx . accounts . from . owner == & token :: ID , ErrorCode :: InvalidTokenAccountOwner) ;
require ! (ctx . accounts . to . owner == & token :: ID , ErrorCode :: InvalidTokenAccountOwner) ;

let transfer_instruction = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . from . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . to . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . authority . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , transfer_instruction ,) ;
